Screenwriter: Til Schweiger, Lo Malinke, Jojo Moyes
Production Co: Barefoot Films, Warner Bros., Mestiere Cinema
Synopsis: A widower grows increasingly frustrated as Alzheimer's disease starts to claim the memories of his loved ones. He soon embarks on a remarkable journey as his young granddaughter takes him to Venice, Italy -- the city where he met his beloved wife.
Title: Head Full of Honey
